title: Plaid Cymru's 2017 spring conference in Newport
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Plaid Cymru's 2017 spring conference in Newport 
Watch live coverage of Plaid Cymru's 2017 spring conference in Newport on Friday 3 and Saturday 4 March. 
This shows proceedings on the main stage from 10:00 to 16:00 GMT, and includes English translations of speeches in Welsh. 
Please note there may be times when proceedings are taking place away from the main stage or in private - these will not be shown. 
Click here to watch coverage without English translation. 
See the BBC News website for the latest political updates. Read more
